name: The School (reaperaru, Reiyx, yeenxdd, Yong Gee Enn, potanim)
name_original: The School (reaperaru, Reiyx, yeenxdd, Yong Gee Enn, potanim)
description: The School is a top down 2D game about bully. By playing the game of choice, throughout the end it give players a statement of how or why it happened. The objective of the game is to increase awareness of social impact.
